beers.summary:
Fresh Orange Juice Pale Ale.
aisonHands:

beers.beer: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #23. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.description: -Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.
beers.summary: -Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of maraschino cherries, awake minds coffee, blackcap raspberry, and cocoa powder.
beers.description: Zinfandel Grape Imperial Stout. 11.4% Brewed with oats and a plethora of specialty malts. Primary fermentation in stainless upon mountains of hand crushed Zinfandel grapes. The result is a complex and luscious reimagining of one of our most dark and devastating beers. No more hope. No more dawn. Only void.
beers.summary:
Zinfandel Grape Imperial Stout. 11.4% Brewed with oats and a plethora of specialty malts. Primary fermentation in stainless upon mountains of hand crushed Zinfandel grapes. The result is a complex and luscious reimagining of one of our most dark and devastating beers. No more hope. No more dawn. Only void.
Notes of maraschino cherries, awake minds coffee, blackcap raspberry, and cocoa powder.

beers.beer: King Paimon: Local Cherry Farmhouse Ale. 4.8% Brewed with pilsner malt and raw wheat. Gently hopped in the kettle with Crystal. Fermented with our Magickal saison yeast in an open top stainless tank upon mountains of sweet white and tart red cherries from our main man Ben Wenk at Three Springs Fruit Farm in Adams County.
beers.description: -Notes of cherry pie filling, creaky barns, raspberry preserves, and oatmeal cookies.
beers.summary: -Notes of cherry pie filling, creaky barns, raspberry preserves, and oatmeal cookies.

beers.notes: Notes of coconut macaroon, fall baking spices, cranberry honey, and brisk ocean breeze.
beers.description: Lobster Chamomile Lager. 4.2% Brewed entirely with German pilsner malt and whole local lobsters. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with French Strisselspalt and Chamomile flowers. Fermented and lagered in stainless for many moons. Gently dry hopped with more Strisselspalt and a touch of Czech Kazbek.
beers.summary:
Lobster Chamomile Lager. 4.2% Brewed entirely with German pilsner malt and whole local lobsters. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with French Strisselspalt and Chamomile flowers. Fermented and lagered in stainless for many moons. Gently dry hopped with more Strisselspalt and a touch of Czech Kazbek.
Notes of coconut macaroon, fall baking spices, cranberry honey, and brisk ocean breeze.

beers.notes: Notes of hard candies, dandelion greens, red sorrel, and underripe peach
beers.description: Watermelon Shiso Table Bier. 4.2% Brewed with raw barley grown out of our spent grain by our dear comrades at Two Particular Acres. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with French Strisselspalt along with heaps of shiso from Jeans farm. Fermented in stainless with our Magickal saison yeast, then conditioned on local heirloom Moon and Star Watermelons.
beers.summary:
Watermelon Shiso Table Bier. 4.2% Brewed with raw barley grown out of our spent grain by our dear comrades at Two Particular Acres. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with French Strisselspalt along with heaps of shiso from Jeans farm. Fermented in stainless with our Magickal saison yeast, then conditioned on local heirloom Moon and Star Watermelons.
Notes of hard candies, dandelion greens, red sorrel, and underripe peach

beers.notes: Notes of bursting kiwi, guava smoothie, strawberry, and dried apricot.
beers.description: Local Malt IPA. 6.66% Brewed with Proximity malt and a dash of pilsner. Solely hopped in the kettle with the almighty Simcoe. Dry hopped with an embarrassing amount of Jean's hand selected Nelson Sauvin and Pacific Jade from New Zealand.
beers.summary:
Local Malt IPA. 6.66% Brewed with Proximity malt and a dash of pilsner. Solely hopped in the kettle with the almighty Simcoe. Dry hopped with an embarrassing amount of Jean's hand selected Nelson Sauvin and Pacific Jade from New Zealand.
Notes of bursting kiwi, guava smoothie, strawberry, and dried apricot.

beers.notes: Notes of candied yams, crisp fall evenings, clove cookies, and hard toffee candies.
beers.description: Sweet Potato Fest Bier. 5.8% Brewed with Munich and Crystal malts and a whole lot of Lancaster County sweet potatoes. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Cascade. Fermented in stainless at cool temperatures with our house ale yeast.
beers.summary:
Sweet Potato Fest Bier. 5.8% Brewed with Munich and Crystal malts and a whole lot of Lancaster County sweet potatoes. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Cascade. Fermented in stainless at cool temperatures with our house ale yeast.
Notes of candied yams, crisp fall evenings, clove cookies, and hard toffee candies.
